Headline: #10 Museum of Science & Industry Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Balbo
ShortDescription: Northbound 10 Museum of Science & Industry buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt and State due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #10 Museum of Science & Industry buses are temporarily rerouted via Lake Shore Drive, Roosevelt and State, due to street blockage near Michigan/Balbo.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #77 Belmont Temporary Reroute at Belmont/Damen
ShortDescription: 77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted via Belmont, Western, Roscoe, Damen, and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Damen.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#77 Belmont buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Belmont, Western, Roscoe, Damen, and Belmont due to, street blockage near Belmont/Damen.

Allow extra travel time.
